title: Accepting applications for 2021 O/L exam ends tomorrow
content: Accepting applications for the 2021 (2022) G.C.E. Ordinary Level examination ends tomorrow (February 17).Commissioner-General of Examinations, L.M.D. Dharmasena said the candidates who are yet to submit their applications can do so within the course of the day.The deadline to send in applications for the Ordinary Level exam was extended on several occasions due to the ongoing pandemic situation in the country.
